title: Database Creation
text: SQL execution is not directly related to database creation. While you could use SQL to create databases, there are many other uses of SQL.

title: Best Study Methods for Learning SQL
text: Reading may broaden your perspective but may not improve your competence in SQL. On the other hand, going into detail into a case study may be useful for identifying problem areas, but it may not help with resolving them. Overall, reading about SQL or case studies may not be the most active way to gain proficiency in SQL.

title: Constructing Queries.
text: The best way to learn specific SQL syntax is to type it out for various question types. Practice makes perfect!
